author: trawick
msg: Fix the binary build install script so that the build logic
created by "apxs -g" will work when the user has a binary
We didn't copy enough of the build directory and we edited

author: gregames
msg: Wait for 2 seconds before updating the User.Profile and Custom.Ads files
so subsequent stat()s can reliably tell they have changed.  The previous
code had the right idea, but the wrong units.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: Only start one server instance until we need the other one for the proxy

author: trawick
msg: fix a major snafu that broke binary builds
